meanings.definition: A marine mollusk with a broad body and a large internal shell.
meanings.sent1: The cuttle swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I found a beautiful cuttle on the beach during my vacation.
meanings.sent3: The cuttle decided to throw a party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was a colorful cuttle exploring the depths of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The cuttle's shell shimmered in the sunlight, captivating all who saw it.

meanings.definition: A bone of a cuttlefish used for making powder for polishing.
meanings.sent1: She used the cuttle to polish the silver jewelry.
meanings.sent2: The cuttlefish bone was essential for creating the fine powder.
meanings.sent3: The cuttle thought it was a famous artist painting with its bone.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a cuttle, smoothing out the rough edges of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The cuttlefish bone transformed into a magical tool for perfection.
